award_title: CAREER: The Evolution of Magnetospheric Plasma Waves in Response to Solar Driving
subject: Multi-mission data pipelines
body:
Wrangling data from different spacecraft missions—each with its own format—seems like a nightmare to share. Your preprocessing pipelines probably work great on your machine, but getting students or collaborators set up is another story.

I built Ouro to make computational tools actually runnable by others. Think executable environments, not supplementary zip files that bit-rot.

Quick chat in the new year?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
